title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, there is no children node listing.
EB: The children of the new data source should be listed out.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a new data set without SQL statement. 
2. The new data source should not have any database/table/column information.

Actual result: There is no children node listing when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab. Close the data set editor and reopen it.

Expected result: When changing the data source, the new data source's children should be listed out.
